purpose: Explain the importance of Customer Experience Management (CEM) for clients.
title: Why Customer Experience Management (CEM)?

bullets.text: Experience excellence is essential in today's complex multichannel environment, where expectations are set by companies like Apple, Amazon, Netflix and Tesla – today's wow is tomorrow's so what
The most pressing need is where an organization's ability to sell its goods and services is predicated on the quality of the associated experience
Best-in-class experience brands leverage all that they know about customers to constantly invest in improving the ease and quality of experiences to enrich levels of engagement

reasoning_strategy: Highlighting key aspects of CEM and their importance in modern business.
